ChunkText: complete all sections of the application as per the directions provided. ensure that you obtain electronic support from your academic advisor as indicated in the recommendations section. after uploading all necessary requirements, click submit. isss advisors will review your application and contact you after receiving your advisors recommendation.
ContextBefore: although international student and scholar services isss sends reminders before the I-20 end date, it is your responsibility to ensure timely application for an extension. application process login to your isss portal. click on search forms in the top right corner of the page. choose the relevant request, which is the program extension f-1.
ContextAfter: additional information it is important to note that extensions may be requested for any duration that your academic advisor deems necessary to complete your program. in addition, the required financial documentation must demonstrate the necessary support from your financial sponsor for the additional duration of the program.
